name: KaadasHome
0:
”Alexa, unlock the front door.”
”Alexa, lock the front door.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Kaadas Home skill and Alexa, you can control Kaadas Home Lock using Alexa voice commands.
Please register your Kaadas Home lock using the Kaadas Home application, which can be downloaded from Apple Apps Store and Google Play Store. You may set a friendly name for your lock in Kaadas Home application. Eg front lock, back lock.

Please enable Kaadas Home skill in Alexa, then sign in to the account that you have registered your Kaadas Home lock with. After that you may control your device using Alexa voice commands to:
- lock/unlock your door and check your lock’s status

Voice command 
- "Alexa, open the door"
- "Alexa, close the door"

The skill content is in English.
Additional Support
For additional help, please email support@kaadassecurityhome.com
